parameters.query:
=WITH value_rows AS (
  SELECT * FROM json_to_recordset($1::json) AS x(
    recorded_at TEXT,
    date TEXT,
    device_name TEXT,
    entity_id TEXT,
    power_w NUMERIC,
    voltage_v NUMERIC,
    current_a NUMERIC
  )
)
INSERT INTO home.power_log (recorded_at, date, device_name, entity_id, power_w, voltage_v, current_a)
SELECT 
  recorded_at::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
  date::DATE,
  device_name,
  entity_id,
  power_w,
  voltage_v,
  current_a
FROM value_rows
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
RETURNING id, device_name, power_w;
